Initializer# init(buffer:offset:descriptor:)

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.15+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+

```

    buffer: any MTLBuffer,
    offset: Int,
    descriptor: MPSVectorDescriptor
)
```
